content.text: Hi there! I'm a big fan of comic books and anime! Do you have a favorite character?
I love Batman! I think he's a really well written character with a great story.
I agree! He's a really relatable character. Do you like dressing up as your favorite characters?
I don't really have the time to dress up, but I do love watching cosplay videos.
Me too! They're so creative and inspiring. I love seeing how people bring their favorite characters to life.
Have you been to any comic conventions?
I have! I went to Comic-Con in San Diego a few years ago and it was amazing! I got to meet so many cool people and see some really amazing cosplay.
That sounds like so much fun! I've always wanted to go to Comic-Con.
You should definitely go! It's an amazing experience.
I'll have to plan a trip soon!
Great! I'm sure you'll have a blast.
